Description:
Well Testing Operator (Must Have Kuwaiti Heavy driver’s license)Check the PPE, SCBA, fire extinguisher, assembly point, windsock, location etc.
Responsible for measurements of API gravity, gas gravity, pH, salinity, BS&W, H2S, etc.
Responsible for the operation of the GOR test unit.
Responsible for timely readings, mobilization, rig-up & rig-down.
Willingness to do maintenance of equipment.
Assist and willingness to work in all related job practices.
Willingness to work in KOC testing operations jobs with 3-man crew. 
Report to the Supervisor.Skills
Skills: Experience - Minimum 10years(Secondary)/4years(Diploma) of experience in related oil field.
MUST HAVE - Valid Kuwaiti Heavy driver’s license, Ready to work on heavy lifting jobs.
